name: Quantum Hop (Evie (GVguide))
description:
Our first game ever. We learned so much! Submitted to Indie Game Dev Beginners #003.

Controls seem to be WASD and arrow keys don't work - sorry, fellow arrow key enthusiasts, I swear it worked in Unity. I might upload another version after I learn how to fix that, but not now because it's a jam submission. (and we're exhausted.)

Evie Hartman and Josh Jones - Design.
Matt Komlofske - Music.
Ted McCormick - advising us at every step, showing us how to organize our workflow, and teaching us so much about what to keep in mind when making games!
